Author: rublix
Title: [ANN] [Airdrop] Rublix - Merging Modern Day Finance With Blockchain Technology.
Body: We are working really hard on finishing up the first public release of Hedge right now so that we are able to target much larger exchanges in order to increase liquidity and get our brand more established. Unfortunately since we did not go the ICO route, we have to be very strategic with our funds and how we spend since we aren't in the shape of most projects.  A few key members of the team are at the Consensus conference and therefore the bounties are a bit late to be distributed. They are still being paid out though on the daily so we will get to everyone we are hoping within the next 7-10 business days. The program is also still active if anybody wants to join in.

Author: jm1121
Title: [ANN] [Airdrop] Rublix - Merging Modern Day Finance With Blockchain Technology.
Body: Hello,  I have questions for the team.  1)  Are there any partnerships with other crypto ventures / real world businesses? 2)  Is there additional news we can expect besides the Hedge app launch in the next month or two? 3)  What are your plans to solve the current liquidity issues we've experienced since launch?  There is no volume. <- This is a huge issue. 4)  I firmly believe you should invest capital into marketing as soon as feasible - please update the community on if this is a plan moving forward. 5) Back to liquidity - we are currently at a seven million market cap - do you have a goal you are able to share?  Where do you see Rublix position in the crypto universe. 6) Are there plans to list on additonal exchanges - this will tie in to the liquidity question posed above.  I believe in this project and hope to see more announcements on social media, partnerships, and volume.  Gain the interest of the crypto community somehow - let me know if you need assistance.  Kind regards.

Author: rublix
Title: [ANN] [Airdrop] Rublix - Merging Modern Day Finance With Blockchain Technology.
Body: Thanks for the questions:  1. We are actively looking for strategic partnerships. A couple are still in negotiation stages so we can't disclose the full details yet until they finalize. 2. There will be updates on our blockchain R&D side and we will be releasing more smart contracts that can be used for performance ranking. Provided partnerships mature within this time-frame, we will be announcing those too. 3. We have applied to several bigger exchanges, we are just waiting to hear back from them. Unfortunately QRYPTOS was the only decent one who was able to fit us in a timely fashion. 4. Marketing at this point has been very minimal as we haven't done an ICO, we don't have a massive amount of funds to work with so almost all of our efforts are organic and from community support. Once we are able to fund a proper marketing campaign, we definitely will ramp it up. Development has always been our first priority. 5. We have big goals, Hedge and our other DApps are just the beginning. Our team has found a huge passion for refining the blockchain aspect of the project so everyone can expect massive developments in this area. Rublix Development Inc itself is a software company and therefore, you will see us expanding in as many directions as possible throughout the blockchain community. 6. Of course.

Author: rublix
Title: [ANN] [Airdrop] Rublix - Merging Modern Day Finance With Blockchain Technology.
Body: Anyone who participated in the bounty program please use our form on the website to claim your bounties or email: rhys@rublix.io  Few Updates: We have currently pivoted our Hedge DApp development to the PoA network (potential partnership announcement coming up) as Ethereum has posed nothing but issues. Our consensus and blockchain model is continually being refined and perfected. Many mainstream blockchains operate inefficiently and we want to make sure our chain can handle an enterprise load level. Airdrop to Round 1 subscribers will receive their tokens by the end of this month/first week of April. We are in talks with several (reputable) exchanges to have our RBLX token listed on (in April).  Make sure to subscribe to our Official Blog (https://blog.rublix.io) as we are now doing weekly development blog posts to keep the community informed on our progress.

Author: rublix
Title: [ANN] [Airdrop] Rublix - Merging Modern Day Finance With Blockchain Technology.
Body: We have nothing to do with GoNetwork. Nor will we spam anyone with any unrelated emails.  Quote from: cyprto_spell on February 12, 2018, 06:00:46 PM How do I sign up for the private pre sale? I am an accredited investor.  You can apply at: https://rublix.io/presale  Quote from: yommey on February 11, 2018, 10:50:34 PM This project looks good and the team also looks solid from various background. However, i think they need to focus more on how to meet up on their roadmap, delay isn't good for business even though you wanna make sure you leave no stone un-turned. Good luck and how to welcome you into crypto space soonest.  Nobody likes delays but this industry is plagued with it. We are striving to hit every deadline but nothing can be guaranteed. Progress is happening each day and its only getting stronger as we scale our team. Since we have not taken the traditional ICO route we've had to be vigilant with our internal funds.  Quote from: propabags on February 11, 2018, 10:56:02 PM Quote from: Globee07 on February 11, 2018, 08:46:47 PM Finally a proper announcement post, getting fewer and fewer day by day, good luck guys!  I agree as well, so much amateur ANNs with amateur presentation and websites. This one means business! Truly promising project, very thorough in presentation, the whitepaper is clear and if you are not technical the vimeo video shows everything you need to know. I am excited for Hedge, I would love to give AND get calls from fellow traders. Best of luck team, I will be watching this closely!  and to the other messages above me, if you go on the website the roadmap looks on schedule to me. The whitepaper has a lot of details on the project as well.  Thank you for the kind words! We are working very hard to turn this into an amazing platform  Quote from: Guenther-Hodapp on February 10, 2018, 05:17:05 PM Quote from: rublix on February 07, 2018, 07:42:01 AM Quote from: primcoin on February 06, 2018, 03:01:43 AM This looks like an intriguing project. Love the idea and very excited to see it come into play over the next little while. Are you guys doing an ICO? I didnâ€™t see any token sale information.  Thanks for the kind words, we are just as excited too!  We are not doing an ICO just an airdrop to users for now. Funds have been raised privately for the project.  Thank you for your project and this great work. is there a bounty intendet? I would like to be part of your community  Our bounty program is debuting next week!

Author: rublix
Title: [ANN] [Airdrop] Rublix - Merging Modern Day Finance With Blockchain Technology.
Body: https://rublix.io/images/header-rblx-bitcoin-talk.png  Welcome to the world of Rublix, a software development company headquartered out of Singapore and Calgary, Alberta, Canada. Rublix is developing a unique ecosystem for investors, traders and market professionals. A place where reputation and accuracy dominates.  Hedge, our first flagship DApp is designed for traders to share high-quality information and predictions for any market (cryptocurrency, forex, derivatives, traditional equity markets, etc.) users predictions are then verified using smart contracts and an immutable blockchain constructed to showcase prominent information for all available markets.  Hedge is a place where experienced traders can earn RBLX tokens for providing accurate predictions and where trading newcomers can gain access to these predictions using RBLX tokens.  We encourage you to review the Rublix Whitepaper for full technical details on our DApp and proprietary blockchain project.  Participate in Our Live Airdrop Campaign  Rublix is currently in a phase one airdrop. To participate in the airdrop campaign and receive free RBLX tokens, we invite you fill out the form at the link below and we are antciptating a March distribution.  https://rublix.io/images/token-drop-5.png  The Rublix Airdrop Campaign is available here for a limited time. This page contains all needed instructions to participate.  Who is Behind Rublix?  Dave Waslen - MBA - London Business School; BA - Dartmouth College; PE and VC background; Co-Founder of Chrysalis Acquisition Partners.   Peter Danihel - Self-taught programmer; Experienced options trader; Extensive experience with app development, including the sale of several internet businesses.   Rhys Boulanger - Experienced e-commerce entrepreneur; Developed ranking algorithms on Google; SEO Contractor.   Chris Chan - Bachelor of Engineering - Mount Royal University; Background in smart contract development, finance, and derivatives trading.   Jeff Chin - BBA - Northern Alberta Institute of Technology; Entrepreneurial background as the Co-Founder of Kleverhance and TAS Group.   Adrian Radulescu - Electrical engineer; Extensive background in software development, data science, machine learning, visual recognition, and market forecasting.   Our Advisors   Simon Gerovich - Chairman of Red Planet Hotels â€“ Formerly an equity derivatives trader at Goldman Sachs; Holds a BA in Applied Mathematics from Harvard University.   Irina Demina - Vice President - Corporate Development at The Argon Group and has experience in bringing many start-ups to life in the blockchain space; Irina received an MBA from London Business School.   Elena Ershova - Founder of Afina Capital, a capital markets advisory firm; Extensive global markets experience having worked for leading international companies and banks in Russia, Germany and the US; Holds an Executive MBA degree from London Business School and Columbia Business School.   Nagu Thogiti - Mathematician and computer scientist with 20+ years of cryptography and AI experience; Certified professional from MIT and member of American Mathematical Society and IEEE; Blockchain and protocol security advisor and smart contract auditor for several blockchain businesses.   Our full list of team members can be found here. https://rublix.io/team  Welcome to the World of Rublix:  Project Homepage: https://rublix.io/ Airdrop Link: https://rublix.io/airdrop/ Rublix Github: https://github.com/rublixdev/ Whitepaper: https://github.com/rublixdev/whitepaper Blog: https://blog.rublix.io/ Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/Rublix/ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/rublixdev/ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/rublixdev/ Telegram: https://t.me/rublixdev Private Pre-Sale Application: https://rublix.io/presale  Contact Us:  General Inquiries info@rublix.io

Author: rublix
Title: [ANN] [Airdrop] Rublix - Merging Modern Day Finance With Blockchain Technology.
Body: The Rublix project has been around since late 2016; however, the roadmap has changed significantly since the beginning and is one of the major reasons why we have not gone to extensive levels of marketing until recently. Now that our internal workings are in order, we are starting to present our project to the community.  As far as our DApp, we have several smart contracts written that facilitate what we want on the Ethereum blockchain. We are in the works of building a proper UI for the platform and hoping to have an MVP within the next 2 months. This could change obviously as rigorous testing is required before we have a stable preview for the community and token holders.
